original_title: Niroshan Dickwella’s ban reduced, eligible to play cricket again
original_body_lines: Sri Lankan cricketer Niroshan Dickwella’s ban has been significantly reduced from three years to three months.
Accordingly, this makes him eligible to play all forms of cricket effective from today.
Attorney-at-Law Suminda Perera with Senior Attorney-at-Law Ranil Prematilake appeared for Niroshan Dickwella.
